attributes.action: A advertising campaign to show the danger of stranded vehicles on our roads
attributes.additional_details: We need to educate the public to give people space slow down or move over i think there is a lot of drivers out there don't know how to behave when they see a broken down vehicle
attributes.background: The has been a lot of serious injuries and loss of life because people do not give space for the recovery operators to do their job same goes for all road workers
